entries.too_strong: This task is beneath your capabilities.  Are you sure you want to do it?
entries.too_weak: The task I have seems beyond your capabilities. Come back when you're a bit stronger.
entries.npc_continue: Fine then.  Don't bother with me until you're ready to work for me.
entries.npc_quit: Fine.  You are now free of your prior obligation, and you can freely work for me.
entries.player_continue: No, I think I'll keep my current job, thanks.
entries.player_quit: I think I'd like to work for you.
entries.quit_quest: I can see that you're busy working for someone else at the moment.  Would you like to continue to do so, or would you like to work for me instead?
